name: corrugated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of sheets of iron or cardboard) having parallel rows of folds that look like a series of waves when seen from the edge: The roof is made from sheets of corrugated iron.

(esp. of sheets of iron and cardboard) having parallel rows of folds that look like a series of waves when seen from the edge: corrugated tin/cardboard
